statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_data ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT location FROM inventory_data WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location, last_updated FROM inventory_data ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC, last_updated DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_data GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 3 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, location FROM inventory_data WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%' OR item_name LIKE '%jeans%' ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, last_updated FROM inventory_data WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' AND last_updated < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM cross_docking ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT dock_name, status FROM cross_docking WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT dock_name, status FROM cross_docking WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY dock_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN cross_docking ON inventory.product_id = cross_docking.dock_id WHERE inventory.quantity >= cross_docking.capacity ORDER BY inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM Warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory JOIN CrossDocking ON Inventory.product_id = CrossDocking.product_id WHERE warehouse_id = 1;

SELECT warehouse_name, product_name, quantity FROM Warehouse JOIN CrossDocking ON Warehouse.warehouse_id = CrossDocking.warehouse_id JOIN Inventory ON CrossDocking.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE Warehouse.location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM CrossDocking GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 20 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM CrossDocking GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING num_products < 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE state='CA';
SELECT center_name, manager FROM cross_docking_centers WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transit_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT center_name, manager FROM cross_docking_centers ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT city, state, country FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM transit_schedule WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE arrival_date >= '2022-01-01' AND departure_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, location_name, capacity FROM locations WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE location_id = 'fd06b94c-71b0-4d95-908b-af5e2aa6fcc6';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location_id FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT shipments.id, shipments.shipment_number, locations.location_name FROM shipments LEFT JOIN locations ON shipments.destination_location_id = locations.id;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, location_name FROM employees JOIN locations ON employees.location_id = locations.id WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';

SELECT shipments.arrival_date, shipments.departure_date, locations.location_name FROM shipments JOIN locations ON shipments.destination_location_id = locations.id WHERE arrival_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
